author: Jay Peters
title: Apple launches COVID-19 screening app and website
description: Apple has launched a new website and app dedicated to COVID-19 screening, with an online screening tool, information about the disease, and some guidance on testing. The page was developed in partnership with the CDC, the White House, and FEMA.
content:
You can ask Siri for resources as well
Image: Apple
Apple today launched a website and a new app dedicated to COVID-19 screening. The resources offer an online screening tool, information about the disease, and some guidance on when to seek testing or emerg… [+2035 chars]
